meanings.definition: A person or thing that edifies.
meanings.sent1: Teachers are great edifiers in our lives, guiding us to learn new things.
meanings.sent2: The books in the library act as edifiers, providing knowledge and inspiration.
meanings.sent3: The friendly robot in the movie was an edifier, teaching the main character valuable life lessons.
meanings.sent4: Music can be a powerful edifier, lifting our spirits and touching our souls.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the wise owl served as an edifier, sharing wisdom with all the forest animals.

meanings.sent1: The edifiers in the room all had different ways of teaching and inspiring the students.
meanings.sent2: She collected various edifiers, from ancient scrolls to modern self-help books.
meanings.sent3: The group of edifiers gathered around the campfire, sharing stories and knowledge.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with colorful flowers, each one a unique edifier of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were lined with edifiers of different shapes and sizes, each holding a piece of wisdom.
